p.k: 73% Dana, a 10-year-old dinosaur enthusiast, heads off on a prehistoric adventure as she sets out to complete an experiment asking where all the kid dinosaurs are. Family fun
62% Fantasy adventure with Roberto Benigni, a dark retelling of the classic tale of a wooden puppet who seeks to become a real boy. Filmed in Italian with subtitles
60% Fun comic adventure about a four-inch high family who fall foul of nasty lawyer John Goodman. Tom Felton - Draco Malfoy in the Harry Potter films - makes his acting debut
29% High school queen of mean Meredith is determined to break up the teenage BFFs. Sugar and spice comedy co-starring Jon Voight
59% A group of youngsters find a small alien and embark on a quest to help him return home. Family sci-fi adventure
36% When Malcolm McDowell's goofy crooks target the Baxter house in an art robbery, it's up to 10-year-old Finn to defend his home. Baubles and booby-traps Christmas caper

28% Young Kevin McCallister takes refuge from his bullying bro to spend Christmas with his dad. But once again he's called on to fight off two hapless burglars. Family fun
Bernie's back and the kids are thrilled! Until they realise that their old enemy Winston has been released from prison and he's out for revenge. Bernie The Dolphin sequel
